original_text: Appoint judges and officials for each of your tribes in every town the Lord your God is giving you, and they shall judge the people fairly.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주시는 각 성에서 네 지파를 따라 재판장들과 지도자들을 둘 것이요 그들은 공의로 백성을 재판할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: the Lord your God is giving you
and they shall judge the people fairly
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 백성을 공정하게 재판해야 할 것이다
